Uses of Package
cams.user

Packages that use cams.user
Package
Description
cams.domain
A group consisting of staff and student-related classes, which represents the User domain of the application.
cams.serializer
A group of classes responsible for serializing and deserializing .xlsx files.
cams.user
A group of consisting of User and the control classes UserController, which stores all users, and AuthController which facilitates User login, logout and change password.
  • Classes in cams.user used by cams.domain
    Class
    Description
    User
    User entity is the base class for Student and Staff, facilitating the storing of general User attributes userID, name, passwordHash, and faculty.
  • Classes in cams.user used by cams.serializer
    Class
    Description
    User
    User entity is the base class for Student and Staff, facilitating the storing of general User attributes userID, name, passwordHash, and faculty.
  • Classes in cams.user used by cams.user
    Class
    Description
    AuthController
    The AuthController control is responsible for facilitating User login, logout and change password.
    User
    User entity is the base class for Student and Staff, facilitating the storing of general User attributes userID, name, passwordHash, and faculty.
    UserController
    The UserController control is responsible for facilitating access to User credentials.
